name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior PHP Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing efficient, high-performance systems utilizing **PHP**, **Laravel**, and **MySQL** for database management. Proficient in building robust **RESTful APIs** and implementing **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3** to create seamless user experiences. Demonstrated expertise in **Git** for version control and **Agile** methodologies to enhance collaboration and productivity across teams. Adept at leveraging **CI/CD** practices for efficient deployment and strong advocate for **clean code** principles and performance optimization. 
Skilled in problem-solving and effective communication to ensure project milestones are met while fostering teamwork within development teams. With hands-on experience across the full stack, I bring a strong background in integrating modern technologies and practices to drive impactful solutions.
